description: Registers a certificate for a secure LDAP or client certificate authentication.

parameters.name: CertificateData
parameters.description: The certificate PEM string that needs to be registered.

parameters.name: ClientCertAuthSettings
parameters.description: A ClientCertAuthSettings object that contains client certificate authentication settings. OCSPUrl (string) --- Specifies the URL of the default OCSP server used to check for revocation status. A secondary value to any OCSP address found in the AIA extension of the user certificate.

nested_params.name: OCSPUrl
nested_params.description: Specifies the URL of the default OCSP server used to check for revocation status. A secondary value to any OCSP address found in the AIA extension of the user certificate.
